title: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

title: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
author: Bob Marley

title: A painter paints pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence.
author: Leopold Stokowski

title: Music is to the soul what words are to the mind.
author: Modest Mouse

title: Music is a safe kind of high.
author: Jimi Hendrix
